original_title: 바람 부는 날이면 압구정동에 가야 한다
overview: Young-hoon, a poet with dreams of becoming a movie director, films the lives of the people around him in Apgujeong, one of the most modern and international districts of Seoul. However, when he films Hye-jin in her bright red convertible, he falls in love with her image and decides that he cannot live without her.
title: On a Windy Day We Must Go to Apgujeong
